topComments.author: Cassandra Stockley
topComments.comment: Great place, old school in Daytona that is excellent for the kids to run around and play games to win prizes. We've lived here and our kids go almost every weekend. Great place to talk to tourist too.

topComments.author: haley s
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu estava pessoalmente um pouco assustado quando me aproximei do ador√°vel arcade. Mas n√£o me entenda mal, eu amo lugares assustadores, ent√£o tudo bem. A grande van branca estacionada na frente foi o que me chamou a aten√ß√£o (os gatos de rua foram um b√¥nus). Havia uma fam√≠lia na frente que entrou e assim que eles entraram as luzes se apagaram. A m√£e olhou para mim com medo e eles sa√≠ram imediatamente. Apenas momentos depois foi quando um homem incomum saiu do arm√°rio e fechou a loja √†s 20h e n√£o √†s 22h sem nem nos reconhecer. Ele ent√£o deixou o pr√©dio na van para passar a noite. Voltei cerca de uma hora depois, porque ainda deveria estar aberto, e encontrei outro cliente ansioso bloqueado. Ela disse mais cedo que o homem da van disse a ela que fechava √† meia-noite. Ent√£o n√≥s a mandamos para Joyland na mesma rua. Ela nos agradeceu. N√≥s dois voltaremos amanh√£ √† meia-noite para verificar novamente. No geral foi uma √≥tima experi√™ncia, uma noite que nunca vou esquecer.  (Original) I was personally a bit scared when first approaching the lovely arcade. But don‚Äôt get me wrong I love creepy places so it was okay. The big white van parked out front was what caught my eye (the stray cats were a bonus). There was a family in front who walked in and as soon as they walked in the lights shut off. The mom looked at me in fear and they walked out right away. Only moments later was when an unusual man walked out of the closet and closed the store at 8pm NOT 10pm without even acknowledging us. He then left the building in the van for the night. I came back around about an hour later because it was still supposed to be open, and I find another anxious customer locked out. She said earlier the man from the van told her it closed at midnight. So we sent her to Joyland down the street. She thanked us. We will both be coming back tomorrow at midnight to check again. Overall it was a great experience, a night i‚Äôll never forget.

topComments.author: Stephen Hoss
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Quase todos os jogos estavam fora de servi√ßo. Os caras atr√°s do balc√£o parecem estar dormindo metade do tempo. As m√°quinas s√£o imundas como se nunca limpassem o local. Daria menos estrelas, mas meus filhos se divertiram nos dois jogos que ainda funcionavam.  (Original) Almost every game was out of service. The guys behind the counter look like they are sleeping half the time. Machines are filthy like they never clean the place. Would give fewer stars but my kids enjoyed themselves on the couple games that did actually work still.

topComments.author: Sibling Playz
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Levei meus 2 filhos aqui para brincar e aproveitar um dia frio e ventoso na praia. Sentei-me no cal√ßad√£o observando-os enquanto jogavam. Percebi que um dos trabalhadores (e um cara mais velho que estava trabalhando na barraca de pr√™mios na parte de tr√°s) veio at√© onde meus filhos estavam e olhou para eles por algum tempo antes de abord√°-los. Claro que eu estava assistindo o tempo todo e quando me aproximei do cara ele agiu como se as crian√ßas estivessem fazendo algo errado e se recusaram a fazer contato visual comigo. Ambos t√™m 7 anos e n√£o fizeram absolutamente nada de errado, pois sou muito rigoroso e teria intervindo se eles estivessem fazendo algo errado. Cada um deles tinha cerca de US $ 10 de trimestres para gastar. Quanto mais eu avaliava a situa√ß√£o, mais desconfort√°vel eu me sentia (minha m√£e estava comigo e presenciou isso tamb√©m e isso a deixou muito chateada). Eu sinto que este homem trabalha neste lugar ou √© dono deste lugar para atacar crian√ßas. Eu nunca vou pisar para tr√°s neste arcade. Tamb√©m √© tudo em dinheiro, o que em 2022 √© in√©dito. Eu sempre apoiarei as outras pequenas empresas, mas este lugar √© nojento. Cuidado com seus filhos, h√° pessoas m√°s neste mundo.  (Original) I took my 2 kids here to play and enjoy a chilly windy day at the beach. I sat on the boardwalk watching them as they play. I noticed one of the workers (and older guy that was working the prize stand in the back) had come up to where my kids were and stared at them for quite some time before approaching them. Of course I was watching the entire time and when I approached the guy he acted like the kids had been doing something wrong and refused to make eye contact with me. They‚Äôre both 7 and had done absolutely nothing wrong as I‚Äôm very strict and would have stepped in if they were doing anything wrong at all. They each had around $10 of quarters each to spend. The more I evaluated the situation the more uncomfortable I felt (my mom was with me and witnessed this as well and this really upset her). I feel like this man works at this place or owns this place to prey on children. I will never step foot back in this arcade. It‚Äôs all cash only too which in 2022 is unheard of. I will always support the other small businesses but this place is disgusting. Watch your kids, there‚Äôs evil people in this world.

topComments.author: Cassandra Stockley
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo lugar para levar as crian√ßas e solt√°-los. Mais retro, comida r√°pida e muitos jogos e pr√™mios divertidos para ganhar. Grandes assentos no p√°tio tamb√©m.  (Original) Great place to take the kids and turn them loose. More so retro, quick food and plenty of fun games & prizes to win. Great patio seating as well.

topComments.author: Barbara Russell
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Me diverti muito l√° com um amigo jogando e dando meus ingressos fizeram os pais de crian√ßas pequenas que estavam tentando comprar algo na loja de presentes. Perdi meu telefone enquanto estava l√° e a equipe o encontrou, o entregou e o peguei de volta. √ìtimas pessoas! Eles tamb√©m servem √°lcool para quem bebe  (Original) Had a blast there with a friend playing games and giving my tickets did the parents of little children who were trying to get something from the gift shop. I lost my phone while I was in there and staff found it and turned it in and I got it back. Great people! They also serve alcohol for those who drink

topComments.author: Danielle Furze
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos toneladas de divers√£o com as crian√ßas e o cara que administra o balc√£o de comida foi excelente e amig√°vel!  (Original) Had tons of fun with the kids and the guy running the food counter was excellent and friendly!

topComments.author: Ashley Smith
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amo este lugar. Faz-me lembrar os bons velhos tempos...  (Original) Love this place. Reminds me of the good old days...

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Vou l√° h√° anos desde que eu era um rapazinho e ainda amo ir l√°, mesmo quando adulto, os jogos s√£o definitivamente divertidos e as bebidas s√£o √≥timas para tomar tamb√©m quando voc√™ est√° l√° com amigos e tudo o que definitivamente recomendaria ir para  (Original) Been going there for years since I was a wee lad and still love going there even as a adult the games are definitely fun and the drinks are even there are nice to have too when you're there with friends and all that definitely would recommend going to

topComments.author: James Kuntzman
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meu BB .. Ela absoutly adora este lugar .. Acho que passamos mais de 2 horas aqui gastando um total de 18 $ .. N√£o √© ruim ... S√≥ se torna uma m√°goa quando voc√™ tenta com for√ßa e n√£o deixa o talento fluir naturalmente ..  (Original) My BB.. She absoutly loves this place.. topComments.author: Bonnie Levesque
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Centro de jogos. Tempo de divers√£o. Palha√ßos assustadores l√° fora. H√° realmente anexado ao pr√©dio, mas √© estilo carnaval, ent√£o.. √â aceit√°vel lol. As crian√ßas tiveram uma explos√£o e gastaram muito dinheiro. Alimentos de estilo justo dispon√≠veis.  (Original) Game center. Fun time. Creepy clowns outside. There actually attached to the building but it's mardi gras style so.. It's acceptable lol.  Kids had A-blast and spend too much money. Fair style foods available.

topComments.author: Jamie N
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um belo fliperama estragado pela gerente loira e miser√°vel, que parece ter prazer em perturbar crian√ßas pequenas.  O resto da equipe foi ador√°vel e amig√°vel, mas sinto muito por eles.  (Original) A nice arcade spoiled by the blonde, miserable lady manager, who seems to take pleasure in upsetting young children.  The rest of the staff were lovely and friendly, but I feel sorry for them.

topComments.author: Baya Party Slayer
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Melhor divers√£o em Daytona! Adoro ficar aberto at√© tarde, sendo a maior sele√ß√£o de entretenimento do cais. √ìtimo para crian√ßas e adultos. Meu marido e eu gostamos de jogar Deal or No Deal. A sele√ß√£o de pr√™mios para os ingressos √© √≥tima e realista (quantos ingressos necess√°rios para recuperar um item). A lanchonete tem o melhor Cheesestake e bebidas para adultos da Philly. Um √≥timo dia ou noite de divers√£o em fam√≠lia!  (Original) Best fun in Daytona! Love that it stays open late being it's the biggest entertainment selection on the pier. Great for kids and adults. My husband and I enjoy playing Deal or No Deal. The prize selection for tickets are great and realistic (how many tickets needed to retrievean item). The diner there has the best Philly Cheesestake and adult beverages. A great day or night of family fun!

topComments.author: Jurga Tautkute
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Pequeno lugar de arcade na praia que serve sorvete e surpreendentemente - Caf√©-da-manh√£ !! Localizado √† direita na praia com caf√©-da-manh√£ simples e caf√© americano. Apenas a dinheiro . Vistas incr√≠veis e administradas pela fam√≠lia local. Nada extravagante, mas incrivelmente relaxante sem ningu√©m up-selling. Voc√™ faz o pedido no balc√£o e leva voc√™ mesmo para a √°rea de estar externa. Hamb√∫rguer vem sem fogo - voc√™ tem que encomend√°-los separadamente.  (Original) Small arcade place on the beach serving ice cream and surprisingly - Breakfast !! Located right on the beach with simple breakfast food and american coffee. Cash only . Incredible views and run by local family . Nothing fancy but incredibly relaxing without anybody up-selling . You order at the counter and take it yourself to outside seating area. Bte- burger comes without fires - you have to order them separately .

topComments.author: Mama Dee
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Vem c√° desde que eu era crian√ßa, e agora sou m√£e de dois filhos, e eles est√£o ansiosos para nossas viagens ao cal√ßad√£o toda vez que visitarem Daytona, para que possam jogar e ganhar pr√™mios! A equipe √© sempre atenciosa e amig√°vel.  (Original) Been coming here since I was a child, and now I'm a mother of 2, and they look forward to our trips to the Boardwalk every time we visit Daytona, so they can play games and win prizes! The staff is always helpful and friendly.

topComments.author: Crystal Conover
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Muitos jogos estavam quebrados, quentes, sem ar circulando e demoramos 30 minutos para entregar os ingressos! Quando finalmente chegou a nossa vez, o atendente nos pulou, eu deixei passar no come√ßo, mas depois que ele ajudou 3 pessoas que vieram atr√°s de n√≥s e depois algu√©m que havia acabado de chegar, eu falei e ele disse que n√£o est√°vamos no lugar certo - aparentemente precis√°vamos estar um pouco mais √† direita. Eu disse, chegamos atr√°s de algu√©m que voc√™ acabou de servir e onde est√° a placa dizendo que precisamos estar l√°? Ele foi rude e lento! Toda essa √°rea n√£o √© eficiente com o atendente constantemente saindo para entrar em outra sala para recuperar itens! As crian√ßas √†s vezes demoram um pouco para decidir o que querem, voc√™ pensaria que ele poderia realizar v√°rias tarefas e trabalhar mais de 1 de cada vez, em vez de apenas ficar esperando! n√£o vai voltar  (Original) Lots of games were broken, hot with no air circulating and took us 30 min to turn in tickets!  When it was finally our turn, attendant skipped us, I let it go at first but after he helped 3 people that came after us and then someone who had just walked up, I spoke up and he said we weren't in the right spot - apparently we needed to be a little more to the right. I said, we came up behind someone you had just served and where is the sign saying we need to be over there?  He was rude and slow!  That whole area is not efficient with attendant constantly leaving to go into another room to retrieve items!  Kids sometimes take awhile to decide what they want, you would think he could multi-task and work more than 1 at a time, rather than just standing there waiting! Will not be coming back

topComments.author: Steven H
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A entrada principal fica no cal√ßad√£o de frente para o mar. Este fliperama √© mais limpo e oferece mais m√°quinas de bilheteria do que o outro fliperama no cal√ßad√£o.  (Original) The main entrance is on the boardwalk facing the ocean. This arcade is cleaner and offers more ticket-prize machines than the other arcade on the boardwalk.

topComments.author: Lakeland/Winter Haven Kayak Tours
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Adoramos este lugar!! Os jogos s√£o incr√≠veis e os pre√ßos para jogar s√£o baratos! Eles oferecem comida e bebida tamb√©m!! √ìtimo lugar para se visitar enquanto estiver em Daytona no cal√ßad√£o. Observe atentamente o balc√£o de ingressos ao resgatar, o balc√£o contar√° incorretamente, mas a equipe corrigir√° o problema. A equipe √© muito √∫til, portanto, com isso, recomendamos visitar enquanto estiver em Daytona Beach na caminhada da prancha.  (Original) We love this place!! Games are awesome, and prices to play are cheap! They offer food and drink as well!! Great place to visit while in Daytona on the boardwalk. Carefully watch the ticket counter when redeeming, the counter will incorrectly count but the staff will correct the issue. Staff is very helpful so with that said we recommend visiting while in Daytona Beach on the board walk.

topComments.author: Stephanie B
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Centro de divers√µes antiquado com muitos jogos. Pegamos nossos dois netos, de 5 e 8 anos, e eles se divertiram muito competindo nos jogos de corrida. Muita bola de futebol e jogos para ganhar ingressos, mas os pr√™mios s√£o super chintzy. N√≥s est√°vamos l√° para nos divertir. Cerveja, refrigerantes e alimentos dispon√≠veis. Belas vistas do oceano.  (Original) Old fashioned amusement center with lots of games.  We took our two grandsons, ages 5 and 8, and they had a great time competing on the racing games.  Lots of skeeball, and ticket earning games but the prizes are super chintzy.  We were there for the fun. Beer, soft drinks and food available. Beautiful views of the ocean.
